SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view

Interface ViewManager

All Superinterfaces:
ConcreteContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUIManager, TUIManager
public interface ViewManager extends ConcreteContext
The ViewManager interface forces the implementers to have methods to show something in the user interface and to be able to manage incoming user inputs

    • showPassiveStartingCard

      void showPassiveStartingCard(String nickname, int startingCardID, String cardFace)
      Show the result of the starting card placement at all the passive clients
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the name of the active player
      startingCardID - is the ID of the starting card
      cardFace - is the face on which the client place his starting card

      clientNickname - the nickname of the client
      token - the color of the token chosen by the client

    • displayOtherPlayersGrid

      void displayOtherPlayersGrid(Map<String,ArrayList<SmallCard>> othersPlayersGrid)
      Displays the grid of other players to the user
      Parameters:
      othersPlayersGrid - a map containing the grid of each other player, where the key is the player's name and the value is a list of SmallCards representing their grid.

      NumOfFinalPlayers - The total number of players needed to start the game
